title: How U.S. oil tanker seizures targeting Venezuela are linked to rising geopolitical tensions with China
summary: U.S. seizures of vessels carrying Venezuelan oil may become a bigger strategic pressure point in the geopolitical battle with China, a major buyer of the crude.
